I LOVE makeup, but shop in the men's section. Don't bother with my hair, but almost entirely female friends. Love shopping at the mall and also love watching Filthy Frank and listening to metal.

The ones on my nose are, real ones are slightly less "sharp" looking...otherwise i think I did a pretty convincing job.

I have natural ones on my nose, but I always wanted them on my cheeks too. I found that the liner I used hasca very similar shade to my actual ones, and then tried to randomize the wize andcshape of them so they didnt look super fake.

dude, you might have depression. that sounds just like depression. are you tired, somewhat secluded, not interested in things you used to love? because i have aspergers AND depression...they play off eachother

Biting my hand, clawing my legs, punching the sides of my head....yeah, I get it when I'm bored or frustrated. I even cause a bruise or two. You have to be conscious of it and release your energy in another way...I sprint around or scratch an inanimate object or grind my teeth. Yes, I look....crazy, but it's better than self-harm.
I don't do it to hurt myself though, just ends up that way.

Do you have any passions? I dont think it means you are completely absorbed by them. I listen to political discourse and read news articles every day, but it's not something compulsive or obvious to others.

A lot of people are automatically saying the stories are false because she told it through Tumblr. I understand the skepticism, but I don't think that's entirely fair. He has been known to be a drug-addicted, rude, cheating person in the past; of course that is different than rape, but those who say "He's innocent because he's super nice!!" are ignoring this.
That being said, everyone is innocent until proven guilty in a court of law. I am not into harrassing either the alleged victim or perpetrator. Leave them be.
